 = Development = 

 == Prerequisites ==
 * Java JDK 1.5 or later
 * Apache Ant 1.6.5 or later

 == Installation ==

 The source repo checks- out and builds an executable jar.

 Run using
{{{
 if ant build; 
 then
  java -jar llg-*.jar;
 else
  echo "Error @ ant";
 fi
}}}
